page.title: 19READING
page.content: We found out about reading we read more at home than at school.About 70% of the children said they read once a day. Quite a lot of us belong to a library either Egham,Staines or Chertsey. Some children have quite a lot of books and a girl has got over 500 books. Most children in the 1st and 3rd year classes prefer Enid Blyton and would rather read fiction than non_fiction. A lot of children chose to read cartoons and annuals like Beano and Dandy. Some boys said they'd rather read the newspaper.when asked:"how would you spend a WH Smith's voucher ?"many answered they would rather buy something else than a book.Roald Dahl's book's are favourites such as the BFG,George and his marvellous medicine and Charlie and the chocolate factory.
